channel.title: curl calls between 2 worstations
channel.description:
EDIT: removed
EDIT: Fixed, what a fool all it took was to use [ /usr/bin/curl.anondist-orig -v "10.152.152.12" ] to bypass isolation. I wonder if there is a better way to do this still.
question was: 1 gateway, 2 workstations, how can a workstation communicate with another workstation using curl only though the local network?
Thank you

[ /usr/bin/curl.anondist-orig -v “10.152.152.12” ]
to bypass isolation. I wonder if there is a better way to do this still.
